rows.label: qst701703_msg0002
rows.name:
Is that a new troupe's name? If so,
they seem quite skilled... The name
itself has a powerful feel to it!

rows.label: qst701703_msg0003
rows.name:
So you're chasing after this Blendy
Something organization? My friend,
of course I'll help you!

rows.label: qst701703_msg0004
rows.name:
If I hear the name Freddy Something,
I'll report to you promptly! In
detail! In great detail!
